name: Apocalypse TD
description:
Apocalypse TD is a apocalyptic tower defense game made with unity. It has a procedurally generated map and semi procedural levels, a save and load system and an tower upgrade system.

I really want to work on this project again and possibly will in the future.

Version 1.1 Changelog:

Added more information for every tower/building.

Changed the textures of the base and decoy building.

You can now see the range of each weapon when placing it.

Bug fixes:

fixed a bug on the donut map that causes zombies to get stuck.

fixed an infinite resource glitch caused by selling the level 1 smg tower.

known bugs:

Zombies stop pathfinding after destroying a decoy.
